name: verifyPriceNullValues
description: The system should not allow a user to enter 0 as the price, as this would result in irrelevant search results.
descriptionHtml: The system should not allow a user to enter 0 as the price, as this would result in irrelevant search results.

testStage.description: The system should not allow a user to enter 0 as the price, as this would result in irrelevant search results.

parameters.name: content
parameters.value: FilterCriteriaExpectedContent(super=AbstractFilterContent(beds=null, bedrooms=null, bathrooms=null, isBeachFront=false, isSwimmingPool=false, isFreeWiFi=false, isKitchen=false, isAirConditioning=false, isWashingMachine=false, isPetsAllowed=false, isHotTub=false, isStreetParking=false, isSuitableForChildren=false), price=[0..0])

steps.name: Read content of the pop-up
